itemDescription: UK Chief Commissioner for The Scout Association

wikipedia_page.main: Tim Kidd  was the UK Chief Commissioner for The Scout Association. As the Chief Commissioner he was the top administrative volunteer of The Scout Association. The UK Chief Commissioner acts as the association's Deputy Chief Scout and appoints a team of chief commissioners and UK Commissioners who are responsible for programmes in their respective fields.

response: *Mr Timothy Kidd – Deputy UK Chief Commissioner, Scout Association. For services to Young People through the Scout Movement.
